SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards

Class Objective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.Objective
Direct Known Subclasses:
CountObjective, PlacementObjective
public abstract class Objective extends Object
Model representation for all the Objectives. Abstract Class: can't create an Objective, but one of its children.

  • Constructor Details

    • Objective

      public Objective(int points, String name, String description)
      Constructor Method
      Parameters:
      points - : the number of points the Objective gives every time the Condition is met.
      description - : a String containing the description of the Objective, used to display it in the GUI.

    • check

      protected abstract int check(ArrayList<PlayableCard> playArea)
      Checks if the Condition has been met and how many times. Abstract Method: its children need to implement it.
      Parameters:
      playArea - : the ArrayList of Cards containing all the Cards the Player has played.
      Returns:
      the number of times the Condition has been satisfied (0 if it hasn't been).

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints(ArrayList<PlayableCard> playArea)
      Calculates the number of points the Player has earned, based on the Cards he has played.
      Parameters:
      playArea - : the ArrayList of Cards containing all the Cards the Player has played.
      Returns:
      the total number of points the Player has earned.
